meanings: (장애물·구멍 등에) catch, be caught, be[get] stuck (in); (기계 등에 끼이다) be[get] jammed; (발이) trip, stumble
(그물·덫 등에) (그물 등에) be[get] caught[entangled], (덫에) be trapped[entrapped]

vlive.korean: 윈 군이 걸릴 것... I think WIN will lose. 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] MCND X Rooftop Live - MCND의 루프탑라이브!
먼저... - 똑같은 사람이 계속 걸릴 수도 있는 거예요? First of all... - So the same person can be picked more than once? 듣기 View video IDOL RADIO : 'IDOL RADIO' ep#574. 오마이갓세븐 (스페셜 DJ 갓세븐 JB&영재 with 갓세븐)
vlive.english: First of all... - So the same person can be picked more than once?

vlive.korean: 그래서 한 번 하는데 진짜 20분 걸릴 때 있어 - 진짜? So, sometimes it takes around 20 minutes to get one game done. - Really? 듣기 View video NCT : 쟈비는 없다
vlive.english: So, sometimes it takes around 20 minutes to get one game done. - Really?

vlive.korean: [촤암놔 그렇게 귀엽게 말하면 최면에 걸릴 것 같습ㄴ] 아닌데요? 굉장히 깔끔한데요? [If you say so cutely, I'll be brainwashed] Nope. It's very clean. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [UP10TION] 방정리가 왜 필요하죠? 맑고 깨끗한 옝이가 있는데💛 (SUNYOUL showing his room)
vlive.english: [If you say so cutely, I'll be brainwashed] Nope. It's very clean.

vlive.korean: 내일 오는 거 아니야? - 오래 걸리나? - 오래 걸릴 것 같아 - 우리가 끝나기 전에 와? What if she comes back tomorrow? - It might take a long time. - Is she coming before we finish? 듣기 View video TWICE : TWICE UNIV. 패션동아리 동아리방
vlive.english: What if she comes back tomorrow? - It might take a long time. - Is she coming before we finish?

examples.korean: The extension of the subway will take several months. 발음듣기 그 지하철 노선 연장은 몇 달이 걸릴 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The extension of the subway will take several months. 발음

examples.korean: He had miscalculated how long the trip would take. 발음듣기 그는 그 여행이 얼마나 오래 걸릴 것인지를 잘못 계산했었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He had miscalculated how long the trip would take. 발음

examples.korean: to fall foul of the law 발음듣기 법에 걸릴 짓을 하다 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: to fall foul of the law 발음

examples.korean: to have a clear/guilty conscience 발음듣기 양심에 걸릴 게 없다/양심에 걸리다 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: to have a clear/guilty conscience 발음

examples.korean: After a serious argument, it can take some time for the wounds to heal. 발음듣기 심한 언쟁을 한 후에는 상처가 치유되는 데 시간이 좀 걸릴 수 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: After a serious argument, it can take some time for the wounds to heal. 발음
